issue.title: [CF 314] Permit aura conditions to check multiple
issue.body:
Maybe.....................


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #314 | Raw

comments.body:
Has the jury reached a verdict?

We have, your honor. We find this idea to be a bad one because the icon shown condition already allows similar functionality.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
